iti45:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti45:2.1: “Enjoy retreat, mendicants, love retreat. Be committed to inner serenity of the heart, don’t neglect absorption, be endowed with discernment, and frequent empty huts.
iti45:2.2: A mendicant who enjoys retreat can expect one of two results:
iti45:2.3: enlightenment in the present life, or if there’s something left over, non-return.”
iti45:4.4: and has drawn near to quenching.”
iti45:5.1: This too is a matter that was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
